answers.answer: Diabetes is the number one factor in male erectile problems.You could ask your doctor if there is anything you can take for that.

question: i'm 54 yrs. old, i have notice that when we start to have sex, i don't get arouse, my mouth gets dry. I am diabete, will this cause this problem. I take glyburide, pain pills for my joint pains.
